Product Name: Cuisinart 744-24 Chef's Classic Stainless Stockpot with Cover, 6-Quart,Silver
Notes: Very good standard pot

Product Name: Cuisinart 6193-20 Chef's Classic Non-Stick 3-Quart Nonstick-Hard-Anodized, Saucepan w/Cover
Notes: This is mostly good for making rice. The size makes enough rice for one person for 3-4 days.

Product Name: T-fal Ultimate Hard Anodized Nonstick Fry Pan 10 Inch Oven Safe 400F, Lid Safe 350F Cookware, Pots and Pans, Dishwasher Safe Black
Notes: Always get pots and pans that come with covers. Hard anodized is the best material because it is non-stick. Make sure to use with non-scratch utensils like wood or silicone.

Product Name: Cuisinart 12-Piece Kitchen Knife Set, Advantage Color Collection with Blade Guards, Multicolored, C55-12PCER1
Notes: These are ceramic knives which need very little up-keep and are sharp but not dangerously sharp. This set has everything you need and comes with covers. I would highly recommend this particular set.

Product Name: OXO Good Grips 3-Piece Plastic Everyday Cutting Board Set - Red, Green, Blue
Notes: Color coded cutting boards are important to seperate between meat, chicken, and veggies. Red is for meat and chicken, green is for veggies, and blue is for fish. You can also get a cheaper brand for this and get only two of them. One for all meat and one for veggies. Ones like this.

Product Name: Clear Soap Dispenser with Rust Proof Pump, Waterproof Labels (2 Pack,16 Oz), Soap Dispenser Bathroom, Plastic Hand Soap/Dish Soap Dispenser for Kitchen
Notes: Always get plastic soap dispensers. Metal will always end up rusting.

Product Name: HOMEXCEL 10 Pack Swedish DishCloths for Kitchen, Reusable Sponge Cloth, Eco Friendly Paper Towels & Washing Dishes, Highly Absorbent, 3 Colors Assorted
Notes: These might look like a weird product but they are fantastic. I use them as kitchen rags to clean the counters, stove, everything. You can even use some for the bathroom but make sure to color code. They are easy to clean by hand and for a deep clean just toss them in the washing machine. They also last a very long time.

Product Name: Scotch-Brite Zero Scratch Non-Scratch Scrub Sponges, Sponges for Cleaning Kitchen, Bathroom, and Household, non-scratch Sponges Safe for Non-Stick Cookware, 9 Scrubbing Sponges
Notes: Basic sponges.

Product Name: OXO Swivel Peeler
Notes: OXO is a good standard when it comes to kitchen items. It is a bit bouggie and too expensive but its always the safe option.

Product Name: Ninja Detect Power Kitchen System Pro with BlendSense Technology - TB401
Notes: Ninja is the main company in the industry. A premium brand would be vitamix. I decided to return my blender because when will I be even making hummus or smoothies anyways. If you are a big smoothie nut though, consider getting one.

Product Name: Brita Extra Large Ultramax 27 Cup Black Filtered Water Dispenser with 1 Elite Filter
Notes: If you live in an area or apartment that does not have good or soft water, then a water filter is absolutely worth it.

Product Name: SANQIAHOME 1200ml teapot with Infuser stainless steel Water Boilers Loose Leaf Tea Maker Water Kettle for Induction/Gas
Notes: These are best and definitely cheaper from authentic stores. I just put the link here in case.

Product Name: Pyrex Mixing Bowl, Glass, 8-Piece
Notes: These are fantastic for storing left over food, mixing meat, chicken, salads, etc.

Product Name: Ball Regular Mouth 16oz Pint Mason Jars with Lids & Bands, 12 Count
Notes: Mason Jars are great for Parfaits or oatmeal to take to work. Also work well as water cups or mugs or storing soup.

Product Name: Corelle Winter Frost White, Round Dinner Plate, Set of 6
Notes: Corelle is a very light yet sturdy ceramic like material. I highly recommend these specific plates.

Product Name: Corelle Classic Winter Frost White, Soup Bowls, Set of 6
Notes: Same as the plates

Product Name: Mainstays Ellendale Drinking Glasses, 16 Ounces, Set of 8
Notes: I don't have particular recommendations, whatever you like the design of. Glass > Plastic

Product Name: Graze by Cambridge Cassis Mirror Forged Stainless Steel 20-piece Flatware Set, Service for 4
Notes: Don't cheap out, get utensils with curved metal handles, not sharp corners.

Product Name: KitchenAid Round Sink Brush with Black Rubber Handle
Notes: This is good for cleaning pots and pans before using the sponge. It helps keep the sponge from getting dirty.

Product Name: Comfy Package Disposable Vinyl Gloves Food Grade Latex-Free Clear, 100-Pack Medium
Notes: Good for handling raw meat and chicken

Product Name: Dish Drying Mat for Kitchen Counter, Microfiber Dish Drying Pad,Large Size Absorbent Dishes Drainer Mats
Notes: Put this under the drying rack or if needed for extra drying space when the drying rack fills up.

Product Name: 7 code Large Dish Drying Rack for Kitchen Counter, Detachable Large Capacity Dish Drainer Organizer with Utensil Holder, 2-Tier Dish Drying Rack with Drain Board, Black
Notes: Something like this from amazon. Only necessary if you have a lot of dishes and the mats are not enough for you.

Product Name: OXO Softworks Chef's Squeeze Plastic Bottle, Medium
Notes: Price is for 2 bottles. Use one for avocado oil and one for olive oil.

Product Name: Hydro Flask Stainless Steel Standard Mouth Water Bottle with Flex Cap and Double-Wall Vacuum Insulation
Notes: Good size for backpack holder. No metal taste, premium build.

Product Name: Contigo Huron Vacuum-Insulated Stainless Steel Travel Mug with Leak-Proof Lid, Keeps Drinks Hot or Cold for Hours, Fits Most Cup Holders and Brewers, 20oz Sake

Notes: Holds sponge and brush very well

Product Name: Anchor Hocking Glass Salt & Pepper Shakers, 2 Piece Set
Notes: Very basic salt and pepper shakers.

Product Name: IMUSA USA Yellow Lemon Squeezer

Notes: Tongs for cooking

Product Name: PrepSolutions 5 Qt Stainless Steel Colander
Notes: For Pasta or other things

Product Name: Great Value Latex Multipurpose Reusable Household Gloves, BPA-Free, Teal Color, Medium SIze

Product Name: Cuisinart Classic 8" All-Purpose Shears - C77-SHR8B

Product Name: 12.5" x 7" Cosmic Rust Silicon Oven Mitt - Threshold™

Product Name: Pyrex MealBox 5.5 Cup Rectangular Glass Food Storage

Product Name: Rubbermaid Classic Step-On Trash Can with Lid, 13-Gallon, Black, Easy Clean Wastebasket for Home/Kitchen/Bedroom/Office

Product Name: Waterproof Rubber Vinyl Apron W/ 2 Pockets - Lab Apron for DishWashing,Grooming Blue
Notes: Convenient so you don't need to change out of your current clothes if you don't want to stain them.

Product Name: SmartDesk Core
Notes: Fantastic WFH desk. It goes up and down and is very sturdy.

Product Name: Amazon Basics Rectangular 8-Outlet Power Strip Surge Protector, 4,500 Joule - 6-Foot Cord, Black/Green
Notes: 4500 joule protection is very high. This is a premium quality surge protector

Product Name: HUANUO Dual Monitor Stand - Adjustable Spring Monitor Desk Mount Swivel Vesa Bracket with C Clamp, Grommet Mounting Base for 17 to 27 Inch Computer Screens - Each Arm Holds 4.4 to 14.3lbs
Notes: This one is not bad but honestly you should get a higher quality one even if its more expensive. This one does work perfectly fine though, but I choose to never move my monitors because getting them back to being perfectly in place is hard.

Product Name: HP M27fw FHD Monitor 27" FHD (1920 x 1080) 48-75 Hz
Notes: I would never recommend HP. I do recommend two monitors though. Going forward get Display port so it can daisy chain, and usb c. Price is for two monitors.

Product Name: Logitech - MX Keys Mini TKL Wireless Bluetooth Scissor Keyboard with Backlit Keys - Black
Notes: If the number pad is important to you consider buying that one instead. One of my favorite Keyboards. I also have a logi+ wirelress reciever to connect to my PC which has both Ubuntu and Windows on it.

Product Name: Logitech - MX Vertical Advanced Wireless Optical Ergonomic Mouse with USB and Bluetooth Connection - Graphite
Notes: I don't actually have this mouse yet buy I plan on buying it based on recommendations

Product Name: My personal PC with Windows and Ubuntu installed
Notes: I have had this build for years and it is still working great

Product Name: Macbook Pro, 14-inch 2021: 1Tb storage, 16gb unified memory, Apple M1 Pro, 10 core cpu, 16 core gpu

Product Name: Amazon Basics 2-Pack HDMI Cable, 18Gbps High-Speed, 4K@60Hz, 2160p, Ethernet Ready, 10 Foot, Black

Product Name: Herschel Tech Daypack Mid-Volume

Product Name: USB C GaN Charger 30W, Anker 511 Charger (Nano 3), PIQ 3.0 Foldable PPS Fast Charger for iPhone 15/15 Pro/14/14 Pro Max/13, Galaxy, iPad (Cable Not Included)-Phantom Black

Product Name: 2 Packs Cable Management Tray, 14 inches Under Desk Cable Holder for Wire Management, Heavy Metal Cable Wire Organizer for Desks, Offices, and Kitchens (Black)

Product Name: SOULWIT 50Pcs Self Adhesive Cable Management Clips, Cable Organizers Wire Clips Cord Holder for TV PC Ethernet Cable under Desk Home Office (Black)
